issue.title: [CF 135] Target percent life
issue.body:
Hi and gratz for this addon.

I'm feral drood, is it possible to add a new event checking target percent life ?
Our talent Blood in a water is awesome but sometimes, depend of type of fight, i miss the 25% life of my target.
I use power aura only for this event now ...
(sorry for my bad bad bad english -_- )


> Posted by CurseForge user nolderynh | Imported from CurseForge issue #135 | Raw

comments.body:
Yes. Simply add a condition that checks the health of your target.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
